appsgate.lig.eude.interpreter.langage.nodes
Class NodeProgram

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.eude.interpreter.langage.nodes.Node
      appsgate.lig.eude.interpreter.langage.nodes.NodeProgram
All Implemented Interfaces:
EndEventGenerator, EndEventListener, StartEventGenerator, StartEventListener, java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Integer>
public class NodeProgram
extends Node

Node program for the interpreter. Contains the metadatas of the program, the parameters, the variables and the rules

Since:
May 22, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Rémy Dautriche, Cédric Gérard
